generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The area to the right of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building, is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story structure with windows and commercial signage is visible on the right side of the image.
- wall: A low, solid wall is visible on the far right, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: A blue circular sign with an upward arrow is visible above the traffic light.
- vegetation: A tree is visible on the left side of the image, partially obscured by the traffic light pole.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows the night sky, with streetlights illuminating it.
- car: A white Volkswagen Sharan is visible in the foreground, stopped at the traffic light.
- truck: A white truck is visible on the left side of the image, further down the road.
- train: Tram tracks are visible on the road, indicating the presence of a train (tram) system.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- person: No person is clearly visible in the image.
- rider: No rider is visible in the image.
- terrain: No terrain (grass, soil, etc.) is visible in the image.
